argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | abbi1dv.1 | |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_alrimiv | |- ( ph -> A. x ( ps <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_abeq1 | |- ( { x | ps } = A <-> A. x ( ps <-> x e. A ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> { x | ps } = A ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ abbidv as of 16-Nov-2019.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-1994.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
